description: Development of 22-24 Highbury Grove involving the demolition of existing buildings (except 24 Highbury Grove) and construction of new buildings for commercial use (Use Class B1) and 72 residential units of flats and townhouses. The buildings range from three to five storeys. This is a minor amendment to planning permission P061268 granted on appeal 11th May 2007 and involves a reduction in unit numbers from 74 to 72, elevational changes to Aberdeen house and internal changes to layout.
decision_conditions:
Details of the green roof shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the first occupation of the new buildings hereby permitted and shall be installed/planted within the first planting season following the completion of the building concerned. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details and shall be maintained as such thereafter.
REASON: To ensure the development provides the maximum possible provision towards creation of habitats and valuable areas for biodiversity.
